Text: Hello frankvalle69 Firstly read the instructions and watch video carefully  and what problem u have said is  'it said in the instructions to PRESS F4 stopped there and it didnt let work when i had to press F5...', it can also be due to that in some pc or laptops in blue screen hex editor ,the function keys is not working or in some it works. try it on different pc.
